;== TRIGGER DATA STARTS HERE ==

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 0001_Advisor_Trigger
    WhenToTest FactionTurnStart

    Condition FactionIsLocal
          and I_TurnNumber > 1
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Advisor_Advice_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 0002_New_Campaign_Turn_Trigger
    WhenToTest FactionTurnStart

    Condition FactionIsLocal
          and I_TurnNumber > 0
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread New_Campaign_Turn_Advice_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest FactionTurnStart

    Condition FactionIsLocal
          and I_TurnNumber > 5
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Following_AI_Advice_Thread  1

    AdviceThread UI_Panel_Overview_Missions_Advice_Thread  1 
    AdviceThread Unexplored_Overview_Mission_Advice_Thread -2 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger 0584_Unexplored_Create_Crusade_Trigger
    WhenToTest FactionTurnStart

    Condition FactionIsLocal
          and I_CrusadeTimeLeft = 3
          and I_CrusadeInProgress
          and I_PlayerHasMission join_crusade
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Unexplored_Create_Crusade_Advice_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 0586_Unexplored_Create_Jihad_Trigger
    WhenToTest FactionTurnStart

    Condition FactionIsLocal
          and I_JihadTimeLeft = 3
          and I_JihadInProgress
          and I_PlayerHasMission jihad_active
          and FactionReligion islam
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Unexplored_Create_Jihad_Advice_Thread  1

          and AdviseRecruit = Genoese Crossbow Militia

    AdviceThread Recruitment_Knights_Advice_Thread  1

    Condition SettlementIsLocal
          and AdviseRecruit = Polish Knights

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Start_Battle_Defend_Against_Cavalry_With_Spears_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleConflictPhaseCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfUnitClass spearmen >= 30
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfUnitCategory cavalry >= 20
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Start_Battle_Defend_Against_Cavalry_With_Spears_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Missile_Troops_Attacking_Spearmen_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleConflictPhaseCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfUnitClass spearmen >= 30
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfUnitClass missile >= 20
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Missile_Troops_Attacking_Spearmen_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Start_Battle_Spearmen_Support_Heavy_Infantry_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleConflictPhaseCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfUnitClass spearmen >= 30
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfClassAndCategory heavy infantry >= 30
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfUnitCategory cavalry >= 20
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Start_Battle_Spearmen_Support_Heavy_Infantry_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Start_Battle_Shoot_Spearmen_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleConflictPhaseCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfUnitClass missile  >= 20
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfClassAndCategory heavy infantry >= 30
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfUnitClass spearmen >= 30
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Start_Battle_Shoot_Spearmen_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Start_Battle__Heavy_Cavalry_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattlePlayerUnitAttacksEnemyUnit

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfClassAndCategory heavy cavalry >= 30
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfUnitClass spearmen <= 20
          and BattlePlayerMountClass != elephant
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Start_Battle__Heavy_Cavalry_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Start_Battle__Heavy_Cavalry_Avoid_Spearmen_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattlePlayerUnitAttacksEnemyUnit

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfClassAndCategory heavy cavalry >= 30
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfUnitClass spearmen >= 20
          and BattlePlayerMountClass != elephant
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfUnitCategory infantry > 1
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Start_Battle__Heavy_Cavalry_Avoid_Spearmen_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_Heavy_Cavalry_Do_Not_Engage_Skirmishers_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattlePlayerUnitAttacksEnemyUnit

    Condition BattlePlayerUnitCategory = cavalry
          and BattlePlayerUnitClass != missile
          and BattlePlayerUnitClass = heavy
          and BattleEnemyUnitClass = skirmish
          and BattleEnemyUnitCategory = infantry
          and BattleEnemyActionStatus != routing
          and BattlePlayerMountClass != elephant
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Battle_Heavy_Cavalry_Do_Not_Engage_Skirmishers_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_Heavy_Cavalry_Engage_Light_Cavalry_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattlePlayerUnitAttacksEnemyUnit

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfClassAndCategory heavy cavalry >= 30
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfClassAndCategory light cavalry >= 30
          and BattlePlayerMountClass != elephant
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Battle_Heavy_Cavalry_Engage_Light_Cavalry_Thread  1

          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_Heavy_Cavalry_Group_Together_Charge_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattlePlayerUnitAttacksEnemyUnit

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits >= 4
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfClassAndCategory heavy cavalry > 1
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnitCategory infantry > 1
          and BattlePlayerMountClass != elephant
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Battle_Heavy_Cavalry_Group_Together_Charge_Thread  1

          and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 1
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

          and I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfAttribute cannon > 0
          and I_BattleSettlementFortificationLevel > 1
          and I_BattleDefenderNumMissileUnitsOnWalls > 0
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

Trigger Siege_Advice_Equipment_Battering_Ram_Breaks_Through_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleBattleGatesDestroyedByEngine

    Condition I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
          and I_BattleAttackerNumSiegeEngines ram > 0
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfAttribute cannon = 0
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfAttribute mortar = 0
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfAttribute rocket = 0
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Siege_Advice_Equipment_Battering_Ram_Breaks_Through_Thread  1

    WhenToTest BattleDeploymentPhaseCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfAttribute gunmen > 1
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Gunpowder_Deploy_in_Blocks_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Only_Cavalry_Vs_Only_Spearmen_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleConflictPhaseCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfUnitClass spearmen = 100
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfClassAndCategory heavy cavalry = 100
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 1
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Only_Cavalry_Vs_Only_Spearmen_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest BattleConflictPhaseCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfUnitClass spearmen = 100

          and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 1
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

Trigger Start_Battle_Horse_Archers_Harrassing_Defensive_Enemy_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleDeploymentPhaseCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfUnitCategory cavalry <= 30
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfClassAndCategory light cavalry <= 10
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfClassAndCategory missile cavalry >= 20
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Start_Battle_Horse_Archers_Harrassing_Defensive_Enemy_Thread  1

          and BattlePlayerUnitCategory = infantry
          and BattlePlayerUnitClass != missile
          and BattleEnemyUnitCategory = infantry
          and BattleEnemyUnitClass != missile
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfUnitClass missile >= 1
          and BattlePlayerActionStatus = missiles_firing
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Wedge_Formation_Change_Loose_Warning_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleEnemyUnitAttacksPlayerUnit

    Condition BattlePlayerUnitCategory = cavalry
          and BattlePlayerUnitClass != missile
          and BattlePlayerCurrentFormation = wedge
          and not BattlePlayerActionStatus = charging
          and not BattlePlayerUnitMovingFast
          and BattleEnemyUnitCategory != siege
          and BattleEnemyUnitClass = missile
          and not BattleIsMeleeAttack
          and BattleEnemyActionStatus = missiles_firing
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

Trigger 1092_Start_Battle_Missiles_Engage_Centre_Then_Assault_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleAiCommenced

    Condition I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfUnitClass heavy >= 30
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfUnitCategory cavalry >= 15
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfUnitClass missile > 25
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfUnitClass missile <= 15
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfUnitCategory cavalry <= 30
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfClassAndCategory missile siege <= 20
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfUnitClass skirmish <= 15
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerAllianceOddsAgainst > 7
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Start_Battle_Withdraw_Now_Run_Away_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1120A_Skirmish_Mode_Advice_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleConflictPhaseCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfUnitClass missile > 0
          and not I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfUnitCategory siege > 0
          and not I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfAttribute gunmen > 0
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Skirmish_Mode_Advice_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1099_Missile_Attack_Before_Engaging_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleConflictPhaseCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnitClass missile >= 2
          and not I_BattleAiAttacking
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 3
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Missile_Attack_Before_Engaging_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1169_Missile_Attack_Heavy_Cavalry_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattlePlayerUnitAttacksEnemyUnit

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and BattlePlayerUnitClass = missile
          and not BattleIsMeleeAttack
          and BattleEnemyUnitClass = heavy
          and BattleEnemyUnitCategory = cavalry
          and BattlePlayerUnitCategory != siege
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfClassAndCategory heavy cavalry < 100
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfAttribute incendiary = 0
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Missile_Attack_Heavy_Cavalry_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1170_Missile_Attack_Light_Cavalry_Moving_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattlePlayerUnitAttacksEnemyUnit

    Condition BattleEnemyUnitClass = light
          and BattleEnemyUnitCategory = cavalry
          and BattleEnemyActionStatus = moving
          and BattlePlayerUnitClass = missile
          and BattlePlayerActionStatus = missiles_firing
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfClassAndCategory light cavalry < 100
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Missile_Attack_Light_Cavalry_Moving_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest BattleAiCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfUnitClass missile >= 25
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfClassAndCategory heavy infantry > 0
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfClassAndCategory light infantry > 0
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and BattleIsMeleeAttack
          and BattleEnemyUnitMovingFast
          and BattlePlayerActionStatus != moving
          and BattlePlayerActionStatus != fighting
          and BattlePlayerActionStatus != routing
          and BattlePlayerUnitCategory = infantry
          and BattleEnemyUnitCategory = infantry 
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

Trigger 1330_Frightening_Units_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleConflictPhaseCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfMountClass elephant >= 1
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfMountClass elephant = 0
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Frightening_Units_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1333A_Breaking_Off_From_Combat_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattlePlayerUnitAttacksEnemyUnit

    Condition BattleIsMeleeAttack
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Breaking_Off_From_Combat_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1343_Ambush_5_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleDeploymentPhaseCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageCanHide hide_anywhere >= 1
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Ambush_5_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------

          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

Trigger 1349_Killing_At_The_End_Trigger
    WhenToTest ScrollOpened

    Condition ScrollOpened conditions_complete_scroll
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Killing_At_The_End_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1350_Radar_Map_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleConflictPhaseCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and BattlesFought = 0
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Radar_Map_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1351_Hour_Glass_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleConflictPhaseCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and I_IsTriggerTrue 1350_Radar_Map_Trigger
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Hour_Glass_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1352_Speed_Settings_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleConflictPhaseCommenced

    Condition BattlesFought > 3
          and not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
          and I_IsTriggerTrue 1351_Hour_Glass_Trigger
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Speed_Settings_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1348_Cavalry_Charges_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattlePlayerUnitAttacksEnemyUnit

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and BattleIsMeleeAttack
          and BattlePlayerActionStatus = charging
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfClassAndCategory heavy cavalry >= 30
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Cavalry_Charges_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------

          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Help_Battle_Replay_Screen_Thread  0

          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1160_Cantabrian_Circle_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattlePlayerUnitAttacksEnemyUnit

    Condition BattlePlayerUnitSpecialAbilitySupported = cantabrian_circle
          and not BattlePlayerUnitSpecialAbilityActive
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Cantabrian_Circle_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Large_battle_Use_Infantry_Core_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleConflictPhaseCommenced

    Condition I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 14
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfClassAndCategory heavy infantry > 40
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfClassAndCategory heavy cavalry > 30
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnitClass spearmen > 1
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Large_battle_Use_Infantry_Core_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Gunpowder_Infantry_Dont_Block_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattlePlayerUnitAttacksEnemyUnit

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfAttribute gunmen > 0
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfAttribute gunmen < 100
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Gunpowder_Infantry_Dont_Block_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Gunpowder_Troops_Destroy_Infantry_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleConflictPhaseCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfAttribute gunmen > 0
          and I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfClassAndCategory heavy infantry >= 1
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfClassAndCategory light infantry >= 1
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Gunpowder_Troops_Destroy_Infantry_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Gunpowder_Troops_Vs_Elephants_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattlePlayerUnitAttacksEnemyUnit

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfAttribute gunmen > 0
          and BattleEnemyMountClass = elephant
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 2
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Gunpowder_Troops_Vs_Elephants_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest BattleConflictPhaseCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfAttribute cannon > 0
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnitCategory cavalry > 3
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    WhenToTest BattlePlayerUnitAttacksEnemyUnit

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and BattlePlayerUnitSpecialAbilitySupported = stealth
          and not BattlePlayerUnitSpecialAbilityActive
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

Trigger Knights_and_Pikes_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattlePlayerUnitAttacksEnemyUnit

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfAttribute knight > 0
          and BattleEnemyUnitSpecialAbilitySupported = phalanx
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Knights_and_Pikes_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Heavy_Cavalry_and_Pikes_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattlePlayerUnitAttacksEnemyUnit

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and not I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfAttribute knight > 0
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfClassAndCategory heavy cavalry > 0
          and BattleEnemyUnitSpecialAbilitySupported = phalanx
          and BattlePlayerMountClass != elephant
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Heavy_Cavalry_and_Pikes_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest BattleDeploymentPhaseCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfAttribute explode > 0 
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1155_Draw_Their_Fire_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleEnemyUnitAttacksPlayerUnit

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not BattleIsMeleeAttack
          and BattleEnemyUnitClass = missile
          and BattleEnemyUnitCategory != siege
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyPercentageOfClassAndCategory light infantry >= 1 
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Draw_Their_Fire_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger 1153_Draw_Their_Fire_Heavy_Infantry_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleEnemyUnitAttacksPlayerUnit

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and not BattleIsMeleeAttack
          and BattleEnemyUnitClass = missile
          and BattleEnemyUnitCategory != siege
          and BattlePlayerUnitClass = heavy
          and BattlePlayerUnitCategory = infantry
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Draw_Their_Fire_Heavy_Infantry_Thread  1 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest BattleDeploymentPhaseCommenced

    Condition not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and BattlesFought > 10
          and RandomPercent > 25
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Choose_Your_Ground_Thread  1

Trigger Siege_Advice_Attack_Objectives_Trigger
    WhenToTest BattleDeploymentPhaseCommenced

    Condition I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
          and I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
          and I_BattleAttackerNumSiegeEngines ladder = 0
          and I_BattleAttackerNumSiegeEngines tower = 0
          and I_BattleAttackerNumSiegeEngines ram = 0
          and I_BattleSettlementFortificationLevel > 1
          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt

    AdviceThread Siege_Advice_Attack_Objectives_Thread  1

          and not I_MapName data/world/maps/campaign/norman_prologue/descr_strat.txt
